It was a birthday celebration as I had mentioned and waiters made no comment on that. Probably will not go there again.

name: Tapatio Mexican Restaurant
address: 3720 Factoria Blvd SE Suite C Bellevue, WA  98006
review description: The service was really good. The food and decor are the same as every other Mexican restaurant. Food was not bad, not outstanding. Would go back if I was in the mood for Mexican. Do wish they had something different; more authentic.

name: TASTE Restaurant
review description: I ordered the grilled ham and cheese sandwich and the edges were completely burnt and black. Not sure how this passed hands from cook/chef to server without anyone noticing but I was a little disappointed. Other than that, I felt the food was creative and after I pulled the black bread off the sandwich, it was still okay.

name: Tavolata
review description: WE HAD A WONDERFUL TIME. THE SERVICE AND THE DINNER SELECTIONS WERE OUTSTANDING. THIS DINNER WAS FOR A SPECIAL OCCASION (IN LAWS MEETING FOR THE FIRST TIME BEFORE THE WEDDING)AND TAVOLATA HELPED TO MAKE THIS A GREAT EVENING.

name: Terra Plata
review description: Everything was A M A Z I N G!!! Unpretentious and great! Highly recommend.

name: Terra Vista at Snoqualmie Casino
address: 37500 SE North Bend Way Snoqualmie, WA  98065
review description: WE enjoyed the foold and the service was perfect.

name: Terracotta Red
review description: Servers were nice and quick. Food was surprisingly good. Its difficult to find a pan asian done right. This is one of them. We don't visit Everett often but if we do again, we know where to eat.

name: That's Amore Italian Cafe
review description: Service was great. Our waiter was very friendly and knowledgeable. Even though the very small restaurant was full, we never waited too long for the wait staff to come check on us. I would strongly suggest reservations. The place is small and does get a little noisy. The food was amazing. I will be going back.

name: Tilth
review description: We had the most delicious and relaxing dinner! will certainly frequent Tilth! amazing!!

name: The Tin Table
review description: Our server very courteously reseated us when a large group was seated next to us.

name: Toulouse Petit Kitchen & Lounge
address: 601 Queen Anne Avenue N. Seattle, WA  98109
review description: Delicious New Orleans cuisine with an extensive menu that includes something for everyone.

name: Trace
review description: Great ambience and food at Trace. Real makeover from the previous E&O. Food was great.

name: Trellis
review description: Thursday night and it was quiet and not crowded. They provided us with a nice booth by window for two. Very prompt service good food all around.It was about $150 for two with three glasses of wnie, appetizer, salads, entree, and deserts.

name: Tulalip Bay at Tulalip Resort Casino
review description: Great dinner, the steak was delicious!

name: Tulio
review description: The waiters here are very knowledgable, friendly they want to make the best dining experience for you. Food is excellent the fish is cooked to perfection. A must have is the pistachio dessert. I had the orecchiette as a primi and halibut as a secondi. Both were excellent. My husband had the salmon ravioli and the salmon. Again, we didn't know whose dinners or dessert was better. My husband opting for the tiramisu which was soaked in espresso as it should be. A wonderful dining experience.

name: Twigs Bistro - Wandermere
review description: We have been to this Twigs several times and have always found it delightful. However, we were disappointed at the reception we received on this occasion. The hostess was not very friendly and the wait staff seemed to be over-worked. Although our server was somewhat friendly, he always seemed to be in a hurry while attending to us. We definitely felt as though the other customers were of more importance. It may have been that the least experienced wait staff was on duty that particular evening. But we didn't feel very welcome at the restaurant that evening, Sorry.

name: Twigs Bistro & Martini Bar - River Park Square
review description: Food and drinks were good, but I couldn't believe this place is in a downtown mall that charges for parking and they don't validate. For that reason, I wouldn't return to this location.

name: Twigs Bistro & Martini Bar - South Hill
review description: Great place for brunch. Food and service were excellent. Staff very friendly and helpful.

name: Twigs Bistro & Martini Bar - Spokane Valley Mall
review description: Fantastic!! We love this place! Great food and delicious martinis in a fabulous atmosphere!!

name: Twigs Bistro and Martini Bar - Kennewick
address: 1321 N. Columbia Center Blvd Kennewick, WA  98336
review description: I've heard this place was just "okay" from friends and family. But I wanted to see for myself so I went here for my birthday. I ordered pepper salmon, because family gave me a few tips on what was good etc. My salmon was "okay" it came with rice and it tasted like it was microwaved! That killed my whole entire appetite.

name: Two Salmon Cafe
review description: We had a great time on this outing to the Cafe for the Senior buffet. We were well taken care of and the food was top quality! Very well done!

name: Umi Sake House
review description: Great rolls and menu options, food was terrific. Fish was fresh and tasty. Service was a little cold but not bad. Tons of drink choices, lively scene. Loved the wood walls and outdoor vibe. I'd definitely go back when in the Seattle area.

name: Uncorked Wine Bar
review description: This small neighborhood restaurant is perfect. Friendly staff, excellent cocktails - finally someone who can make a great martini outside of Bellevue - and tasty dishes make a pleasant and quiet meal with your spouse. They do let you sample the wine before you buy and that was very helpful. We fully plan on being back again even though it is a bit of a drive for us!

name: Urbane
review description: This was our third or fourth trip and as always the food was wonderful, but this time we had a guest in a wheelchair and another guest with special medical issues with many common foods. The wait staff did a SPECTACULAR job being helpful with seating and respectful and helpful with the food issues, even going so far as to photocopy the foods to avoid list and take it to the kitchen to talk it over with the chef. This was just superb service delivered with kindness!!!!We will be back!

name: Varsity Grill
review description: Fridays and Saturday nights 8:30-10:30 this place has Karaoke with a LIVE band. It is so much fun! We were there for a birthday and were very accommodating at letting us bring our own cake and sitting us by the Karaoke. Fun evening, good food.

name: Via Tribunali Capitol Hill
review description: horrible to find parking which will keep me from going back.

name: ViaVita Cafe and Wine Bar
review description: Food was great. Price to portion was a little on the high end. Unfortunately, they were out of the bottle of wine we selected and instead we had to pay "by-the-glass" prices. Would have liked the waitress to be a little more accomodating when paying the bill.

name: The Vine
review description: Set in a vineyard, the views are spectacular! You can eat in the dining room or outside. The dining room is open to the kitchen, so you can see the chef preparing your meal. We had a lovely, quiet meal!

name: Vino At The Landing
address: 800 N 10th Place Suite E Renton, WA  98057
review description: Excellent spot for leisurely dining with great food and drink.

name: Vino Ristorante - Renton
review description: Service was slow and the sound was terible....couldn't hear person next to me talking. Tables too close for privacy! They charged the wrong sales tax for restaurants as the stadium bonds are paid for and the 10% sales tax is no longer used for restaurants.

name: Vios Cafe - Capitol Hill
review description: We made a last minute reservation and were given a wonderful table. The food was delicious and the service very attentive without being overbearing.

name: Visconti's - Leavenworth
review description: Having been a visitor to Italy and married to an Italiana, I am rather particular about Italian cuisine in restaurants. Visconti's is further notable because it is in a tourist town, which tends to draw poor imitations of any cuisine. Instead, Visconti's has been a pleasure at every visit.

name: Visconti's - Wenatchee
review description: Excellent food and a wonderful wine list.

name: Volterra
review description: First time here with 3 other friends, the food was very good, wine list was exceptional, and the service and servers knowledge of the good and wine was also very good. Would go again.

name: Waterstreet Cafe & Bar
review description: A wonderful meal, but a bit pricey.

name: Whitehouse-Crawford
address: 55 West Cherry Street Walla Walla, WA  99362
review description: Great space- loved the open kitchen. My date's pork was a little dry but my salmon was amazing. Our server was attentive and well informed. Definitely a "must" when staying in Walla Walla.

name: Wild Ginger
review description: This is a south east asian fusion restaurant. Service is great and attentive without being intrusive. The food however just mediocre, they use a lot of "Indonesian" word in their menu that might fool people who doesn't know Indonesian food but for people who was born and raised in Indonesia, I just had 1 bite and told my friends not to see it as an example of Indonesian food. It's not terrible but it certainly doesn't do justice for Indonesian food.

name: Wild Ginger at The Bravern
review description: Loved the green curry crab and sea bass!

name: Wild Vine Bistro
address: 18001 Bothell Everett Hwy SE Ste 103 Bothell, WA  98012
review description: Our dinner was outstanding and the service superb. My only suggestion is that they find quieter entertainment. Even just a single guitar player was loud on the night we were there. Fortunately, we had a table as far away from the performer as possible so we could still hold a conversation. Not sure that a place that size really lends itself to live music.

name: Woodman Lodge
review description: Great "all you can eat" rib night on Tuesdays. They are a bit spendy for the Valley. There are only a few upscale"ish" nice places to eat in North Bend/Snoqualmie and the Woodman is one of them. They get busy for dinner so sometimes service suffers. Make reservations!

name: Zesta Cucina
review description: First time to visit... We felt very comfortable and welcomed. Nice recommendations from menu. Attentive service, with plenty of privacy. We ate early so there were a few younger families, but still felt that it was very special. Nice variety on menu. We'll be back for sure.

name: Z'Tejas - Bellevue
review description: To make a very long review short, the 4 apps we FINALLY got were the catfish beignet, the street tacos, the pan dumplings, and the tableside guac. All were excellent, as was the bartender Kavin. 5 star all the way. My "main" problem is that we waited for 20 minutes after being seated for someone to come around to offer drinks or give us water, nothing. husband went to the bar for us. finished drinks and decided to go try to get food in the bar. Kaven took care of us personally. we had been in the bar earlier so he was almost as livid as us that we never got even one bit of serice. Plus it was by birthday and our fist visit, plus we just moved to town, so it was all very disappointing, except the food and Kavin. Probably won't be back
